title: The Choice is Clear
description:
The Choice is Clear
===================

Author:     Allen E. Banik
Paperback:  48 pages
Publisher:  Acres USA;The Choice is Clear
===================

Author:     Allen E. Banik
Paperback:  48 pages
Publisher:  Acres USA; 4th edition (November 1997)
Language:   English
ISBN-10:    0911311319
ISBN-13:    978-0911311310

The most readable booklet on water ever published. It gives the reasons for using distilled water for drinking and cooking. It reveals that you can consume some 450 pounds of inorganic minerals from some tap and well water in your lifetime. Learn what is really in your water and why it is important to your health and longevity. Distilled water is the answer to remove all impurities.

About the Author:

Dr. Allen E. Banik, was an optometrist who somehow caught the attention of Art Linkletter for his insatiable quest for knowledge, and an intense desire to trace all chronic and fatal diseases to a common cause. Dr. Banik's life spanned 1901-1992 (91 years young) and in The Choice is Clear, he shares one of the real secrets of longevity.  4th edition (November 1997)
